profile:
ALF PAINTING SERVICE

If you're looking for a professional painting and home renovation company with years of experience to prove it, then look no further, ALF Painters is the contractor for you. We specialize in interior, exterior, residential, and commercial painting and our services don't stop there! We can also help you with drywall repair and installation, plaster, stucco ceiling repair and removal, carpentry, Kitchen Cabinet repainting, hardwood flooring and much more! Call one of our customer service experts now and be well on your way to a quote and a beautifully transformed property.

Serving Toronto, Mississauga and the grater GTA area!

Remember when you go with ALF Painting Service we value your business and referrals and are committed to getting it done right the first time. GUARANTEED!

Why use Home Painters to paint your house/office?
•Two Year Guarantee On All Work Done
•Full Workers Compensation
•5 Million Liability Insurance
•Fully Bonded Workers (Criminal Background Checks on ALL Workers)
•Thousands of Satisfied Clients
•Top Quality Paints Used Including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!!

Interior Painting Services Include:
•Painting (i.e. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.)
•Staining (i.e. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.)
•Faux finishing
•Stucco Painting and Repair
•Wallpapering and Removal
•Drywall Repair and Replacement
•Plaster

Exterior Painting Services Include:
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.)
•Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing
•Power Washing
•Caulking
•Rotten Wood Replacement/Repair
services: Condo Painting, House Painting, Commercial Painting, Interior Painting, Exterior Painting, Residential Painting, Office Painting, Staining, Wallpaper and Refinishing.
brands: Benjamin Moore, Dulux , Sherwin Williams, Para etc. We provide great painters and painting products to ensure excellent quality project completion.

profile: Our story began in 2010. We provide a wide range of painting services in GTA area including Toronto, Markham, Richmond Hills, Vaughan, Mississaguga, Brampton, Oakville. We have experienced professional painters, quality paints to finish all our jobs. We can paint your house, refinish your kitchen cabinet, remove popcorn ceilings, paint your background wall, instal pot lights. Our purpose is simple: Fast, Clean, Quality, Insured. We do our jobs always on time and budget. We clean every mess, make sure you get a clean house. No paint will stay where it should not supposed to be. We are professional at doing our jobs to satisfy all your needs with premium materials. We service all our clients to get a smile from all our jobs.
services: painting, popcorn ceiling removal, potlight installation, kitchen cabinet refinishing, everything about paint
name: Panda Dwen Dwen Painting
